doc.after: Electricity in Mangalore is regulated by the Karnataka Power Transmission Corporation Limited KPTCL and distributed through Mangalore Electricity Supply Company MESCOM 170 171 172 Mangalore experiences scheduled and unscheduled power cuts especially during the summer due to excess consumption demands 173 Major industries like Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals MRPL and Mangalore Chemicals Fertilizers MCF operate their own captive power plants 174 175
